meetings.title: Q4 Quarterly Business Review
meetings.description: Review Q4 performance metrics, ROI analysis, and discuss 2025 roadmap

meetings.title: AI Implementation Review
meetings.description: Technical deep-dive on AI agent performance and optimization strategies
meetings.notes: Discussed optimization opportunities in customer service workflows. Client interested in expanding to sales assist agents.
meetings.outcome: Agreed to pilot sales assist agent in Q1 2025

meetings.title: Contract Renewal Kickoff
meetings.description: Initial discussion about contract renewal terms for 2027
meetings.notes: Client expressed strong interest in expanding scope. Discussed potential 40% increase in contract value.
meetings.outcome: Follow-up meeting scheduled for detailed proposal review
